description: This file contains utility functions for filtering and searching recipes based on text, tags, and cuisines. It provides helper functions for string normalization, matching ingredients, and filtering recipe arrays without side effects.

methods.name: norm(str)
methods.description: Normalizes a string for loose matching by converting to lowercase, trimming, and handling null or undefined inputs.

methods.name: ingredientsMatch(ingredients = [], q = '')
methods.description: Checks if any ingredient in the list contains the search query after normalization.

methods.name: searchMatch(recipe, query)
methods.description: Determines if a recipe matches a text search query based on title, description, and ingredients.

methods.name: tagsMatch(recipe, { tags = [], cuisines = [] } = {})
methods.description: Checks if a recipe matches selected tags and cuisines, applying AND logic for tags and OR logic for cuisines.

methods.name: filterRecipes(recipes, { query = '', tags = [], cuisines = [] } = {})
methods.description: Filters an array of recipes based on search query, tags, and cuisines, returning only matching recipes.
